definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: Mollen first joined the U.S. Department of State in 2002.
sentences.chinese: 莫伦初次到美国国务院工作是在2002年。

sentences.english: The U. S. State Department issues a travel warning -- to the world.
sentences.chinese: 美国国务院向全世界发布了旅行警告。

sentences.english: Is the State Department or who is supporting this initiative?
sentences.chinese: 是美国国务院还是谁在支持这项倡议？

sentences.english: The US State Department said the move was counter-productive.
sentences.chinese: 美国国务院表示，此举动会影响和平进程。

sentences.english: The spokesman for the State Department excepted to the statement.
sentences.chinese: 美国国务院发言人反对此项声明。

sentences.english: But Kusa has stopped answering the phone, according to the U.S. State Department.
sentences.chinese: 然而据美国国务院称，库萨已不再接电话。

sentences.english: This podcast is produced by the U.S. Department of State’s Bureau of International Information Programs.
sentences.chinese: 本播客系由美国国务院国际信息局制作。

definition: Ministry of Foreign Affairs/foreign office/Dept. of State
abbr. for 國防部長|国防部长[guo2 fang2 bu4 zhang3], Minister of Defense
Mike Pence (1959-), US Republican politician, US vice president from 2017

pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 Mi4 shu1 chu4

definition: Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-
